oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Unidentified cased tintype of a Federal cavalryman
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This hand tinted tintype is of an unidentified Federal cavalryman. The soldier wears a regulation mounted services jacket, a dark hat, a US sword belt, and holds a .44 caliber Remington "New Model" Army revolver. He also appears to be wearing a ring on his finger.
